title: Virgin Islands National Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     June 28, 2016  New Concession Operator Selected for Cinnamon Bay and Trunk Bay Areas of Virgin Islands National Park  ST. JOHN, USVI â€“ Virgin Islands National Park officials announced that Redwood Parks Company, LLC, has been selected to provide commercial services at Cinnamon Bay and Trunk Bay under the terms of a new 15 year concessions contract, effective October 1, 2016.
